description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In the spirit of Tetris and Hexic, Annecto offers engaging puzzle gameplay like you've never seen before. Use spells to fend off curses, complete levels, and grab the high score! Play alone or with up to 3 friends!
description.short: In the spirit of Tetris and Hexic, Annecto offers engaging puzzle gameplay like you've never seen before. Use spells to fend off curses, complete levels, and grab the high score! Play alone or with up to 3 friends!
